snippet: The Florida Supreme Court decided to grant a new trial in a sexual abuse case after ruling that a state law prohibiting conversations from being secretly recorded makes no exception for crime victims gathering proof of an offense....

headline.print_headline: Florida Court Rules Against Secret Recordings for Crime Victims
headline.main: Florida Court Rules Against Secret Recordings for Crime Victims

lead_paragraph: The Florida Supreme Court decided to grant a new trial in a sexual abuse case after ruling that a state law prohibiting conversations from being secretly recorded makes no exception for crime victims gathering proof of an offense.
